channel.title: New server MirroredGaming
channel.description:
New server its a 718/753 or what rune evo v3 we need support and maybe a mod it has features like...
Custom cosmetic overrides Zombies Onslaught Minigame Custom Dungeoneering Two different systems 753 Items/Interfaces Bossing contracts All skills working Flawless instant switching Automated double exp weekends nice staff and heres the video :P https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZCgDGsxxbQ and heres the client... https://www.dropbox.com/s/1djwnoiniwe16h5/MirroredGaming.jar I will setup the website i need to wait for it to get verified. Hope to see everyone in game :) the owner is chris if your looking for him just yell and ask if chris is on. the co owner is smp173
